item.title: Cold Flame Sparks
item.description: Clanging clashes of weapons can be heard in the darkest part of the forest swamp. A muddy surface impeded anyones swift movement. The splatter of green and red blood fills the air with the scents of rust and spoiled salmon. As the moonlight filters through the dense canopy of the forest, A lady with hair that dances like flames emits a bluish colour that can take the attention of all beings including the forest swamp itself.
